solution_line_template: The baby sleeps {baby_sleep_hours_day} hours a day because {baby_sleep_multiplier} x {samantha_sleep_hours_day} = <<{baby_sleep_multiplier}*{samantha_sleep_hours_day}={baby_sleep_hours_day}>>{baby_sleep_hours_day}

The baby sleeps {baby_sleep_multiplier_relative_to_father} times as much as the father because {minutes_per_hour} / {father_sleep_minutes_per_baby_hour} = <<{minutes_per_hour}/{father_sleep_minutes_per_baby_hour}={baby_sleep_multiplier_relative_to_father}>>{baby_sleep_multiplier_relative_to_father}

The father sleeps {father_sleep_hours_day} hours a night because {baby_sleep_hours_day} / {baby_sleep_multiplier_relative_to_father} = <<{baby_sleep_hours_day}/{baby_sleep_multiplier_relative_to_father}={father_sleep_hours_day}>>{father_sleep_hours_day}

The father sleeps for {father_sleep_hours_week} hours a week because {days_per_week} x {father_sleep_hours_day} = <<{days_per_week}*{father_sleep_hours_day}={father_sleep_hours_week}>>{father_sleep_hours_week}
